speech: Certianly, Here is our menu : Koshari, Tamiya, Hamam Mahshi, Mulukhiyah, Feteer Meshaltet, Hawawshi, Kanafeh, Umm Ali, Basbousa and Samosa. With Pleasure, Here is our menu: Koshari, Tamiya, Hamam Mahshi, Mulukhiyah, Feteer Meshaltet, Hawawshi, Kanafeh, Umm Ali, Basbousa and Samosa.                                                                                               Also specify a quantity for each item for example: "One Koshari and 2 Hawawshi"
